attributes.action: Reduce Tax rate for all key workers, working throughout the Covid-19 epidemic
attributes.additional_details: All key workers that have to leave their homes to help everything run smoothly are at an increased rate of becoming ill from covid-19. It’s a way of keeping morale high and ensuring people continue to work hard and to the best of their abilities.
attributes.background: Reduce the tax rate to 10-15% for all key workers that are risking their health through the epidemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
